attributes.action: Cut all prisoners privileges especially the likes of those in Broadmoor like establishments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that in order to provide the government with more money to spend on health, schools and creating a better social environment that prisoners privileges at the tax payers expense need to be stopped completely.
 Moreover, that their time in jail should be spent constructively in the production of materials for home and foreign poor communities.
The overblown cost of housing prisoners needs driving down and this is a start.
